Room.Name: Lorian Parkway/Hofton Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Lorian Parkway and Hofton Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Hofton Avenue runs east and west, parallel to the northern City Walls. Lorian Parkway runs south out of the intersection through some of the busier businesses in town. The northwestern section of town is known for some of its fine craftsmen and women, most doing business in small shops scattered around the area.
